We all know Henry Ford. Famous businessman and industrialist owning the automobile company Ford. In one of his speeches, he said "Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is a success".

It is very true a thought. In this world, we can never do anything single-handed. A team is required. Don’t forget that even for your education, a team worked for you. The team was of your parents, teachers, elder siblings, tutors, and caretakers.

A successful business is always the result of dedicated teamwork. Teamwork involves different people and different groups across your business working together to maximize their efficiency and reach a common goal.

Teamwork helps in Network Marketing in ways like – 
 a. Helps you address big groups 
 b. Your level in the business increases 
 c. Many brains together can bring new ideas 
 d. Collectively, big tasks also seem small 
 e. You will see a bigger picture with enhanced output 
 f. You can Earn more...!

The program has three types of income namely 
 a. Referral Income 
 b. Business Income 
 c. Bonus Income
a. Referral Income:

This income is earned by the customer when he or she refers someone to join the person and it happens. This income is received as the First Time Bonus and varies according to the level of the referrer.
Procedure and Criteria for Referral Income

Identify your level: To have a clear understanding as what will be your referral income, you must have a clear understanding about our level policy. \n Suppose you refer a candidate X directly under you. Then the candidate for you will be at level 1. If candidate X refers a candidate Y under him or her, then candidate Y will be at level 2 for you but at level 1 for candidate X. Again if candidate Y refers a candidate Z under him/her, then candidate Z will be at Level 3 for you, at Level 2 for X and Level 1 for Y.

It must be noted that you cannot make anyone join at Level 2 or 3 directly under you. It will be the members who have joined you at Level 1 who will be responsible of growing the network. Like in the example, it is Member X who can form your Level 2 by joining members under him/her and Member Y can form your Level 3. As an individual, you can form your Level 1.
b. Monthly Income:
This is another form of income which you can generate from our system apart from the Referral Income.
Procedure and Criteria for Monthly Income

You can earn from only once from your reference. That is the referral bonus or earning we discussed above. Company gives you the opportunity to earn every month from the candidate you refer under you. Not only that, you will be earning monthly from each and every candidate your down-line refers apart from the referral income.

You should note that there is no limit of referring candidates under you and as per their performance, levels under you will increase. You cannot place any candidate directly at any level under you as per your wish.
c. Bonus Income:

Bonus amount is paid to a customer when the referral of the customer joins another person in the group. The more number of referrals get associated in each link hand of the customer, the more will be the bonus. The bonus is paid with the monthly payout of the customer. 
 
 There are two types of bonus,
 1. Monthly Bonus 2. Level Achievement Bonus.
Monthly Bonus
This bonus is paid after observing the monthly performance of the customer. This bonus is paid along with the monthly payout of the customer after checking through from 1st to 31st of every month.

Important Points
a. Customer ID:

a. The Customer ID gets deactivated automatically if the member is not actively participating in the program for 90 days. \n b. In case the member is performing well and meeting the minimum requirements, then his/her ID gets renewed automatically after 90 days. \n c. In case of deactivation of ID, it is not deleted. It is simply deactivated and all the corresponding the levels associated with the ID gets shifted by one level.
b. Income:

a. The overall income (referral and business income collectively) is calculated on monthly basis and paid on the 2nd of every month. \n b. If you want early payout, you can request for that. Minimum payout considered is of Rs. 500 which is processed and disbursed in 48 hours. \n c. All details of your referral and business income will be timely updated from company's end every month. You will be receiving bank transfer data along with reference number and date as part of the data.
c. Refund:

a. In case any customer fails to get any referral within 90 days, his/her Customer ID is deactivated and the money is refunded. 
 b. The customer will get refund only if he/she has not earned a minimum or greater than his/her investment. In case a customer has invested Rs. 2000, then he/she is eligible for refund only if he/she has not earned minimum or greater than Rs. 2000. Else it will be forfeited. 
 c. In cases of partial income, for example, if after investing Rs. 2000, he/she earns Rs. 1000, then after 90 days of non-active status, he/she will receive a refund of remaining Rs. 1000. 
 Our program structure and refund policy ensures that in no circumstances shall any of its customers suffer loss over his/her investment.
d. Advance Income:

We are having a very professionally formulated loan policy for our customers. In case of your emergency needs, you can avail this facility from our end. Go through the following criteria, terms and conditions and procedures to know about our loan policy more closely.
Eligibility Criteria:

1. To be eligible for the advance income, you must be an active member generating business equivalent to the advance Income amount you are seeing for. 
 2. Your advance income amount eligibility will be ascertained from the volume of business generated. We will consider the last three months from the date of the request for your advance income. Then we will calculate the average monthly income you have earned in these last three months in association with us. 
 3. After calculating your average monthly income of three months, we multiply the average monthly income multiply by 4 times. The amount which results is the advance income amount you can avail from our side. 
 4. Minimum monthly Average Income required to be eligible for an advance income amount is Rs. 2500, Rs. 6250, and Rs. 12,500 for Plan A, Plan B, Plan C respectively. 

 For example, you applied for advance Income in the month of April. We will calculate your average monthly income taking into consideration the months of January, February, and March. If your monthly income is Rs. 3000, Rs. 2500 and Rs. 3500 respectively for January, February and March, then your average monthly income is (Rs. 3000 + Rs. 2500 + Rs. 3500)/3 = Rs. 3000.
 As we have figured out your average monthly income, we will calculate your advance income amount , eligibility amount four times. For Average Monthly Income of Rs. 3000, your Advance Income amount can be up to Rs. 3000 x 4 = Rs. 12000
5. We provide a minimum Advance Income amount of Rs. 10000. Rs. 25000, Rs. 50000 for Plan A, Plan B, and Plan C, Respectively. Hence, your average monthly income in the last three months must be equal to or greater than Rs. 2500 for Plan A.

To meet up the needs at the time of emergency, we provide Advance Income Amount to our customers under the following conditions: 

a. Minimum Advance Income amount is Rs. 10000. 
 b. Maximum Advance Income amount can range up to Rs. 2,50,000 depending upon your business volume.
 c. You are eligible for Advance Income only after you have successfully worked for a duration of 4 months with an earning equal to greater than the amount you want advance income for. 
 d. The Advance Income amount is considered to be four times the earning of the customer in the last three prior months from the date of request. 
 e. The Advance Income amount we provide is of 0% interest. 
 f. The Advance Income amount is deducted and settled from the monthly payout of the customer. 
 g. A customer will be again eligible for Advance Income after 12 months from the month of completion of the current Advance Income amount.
Advance Income Recovery Methods

As the company is providing you an unsecured advance income amount on just the basis of your performance in association with us, a few steps which company takes at the time of disbursal of your advance Income amount are as follows: 
 a. As soon as the advance income amount gets credited to your account, the payout option from your wallet associated with the company gets disabled. 
 b. Any sort of income that can be in the form of referral, monthly, or bonus will be adjusted with the amount of the advance income taken by you. 
 c. As soon as your entire amount is adjusted, your wallet is set free from our control and you can use it according to your wish.
